paynl_payment_paylink.title: Pay. paylink
paynl_payment_paylink.paylink_body:
((customer_name)), Thank you for your order from ((store_name)).
If you have questions about your order, you can email us at ((support_email))
To finish your order, click the link below ((paylink))
